alert.note: Alert for Inland Willacy; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo; Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 25 at 2:54AM CST until December 25 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...Hidalgo, Zapata, Inland Kenedy, Starr, and Inland Willacy Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Inland Willacy; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo; Starr
